---
title: "Image Report"
format:
  html:
    self-contained: true
    theme: cosmo
execute:
  echo: false
---
```{r}
#| results: asis

img_files <- list.files("images", pattern = "\\.png$", full.names = TRUE)

cat("::: {.panel-tabset}\n\n")

# Overview tab with all images in a grid
cat("## Overview\n\n")
cat("::: {layout-ncol=2}\n\n")
for (img in img_files) {
  cat(sprintf("![%s](%s)\n\n", tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(img)), img))
}
cat(":::\n\n")

# Individual tabs
for (img in img_files) {
  tab_name <- tools::file_path_sans_ext(basename(img))
  cat(sprintf("## %s\n\n", tab_name))
  cat(sprintf("![%s](%s){width=100%%}\n\n", tab_name, img))
}

cat(":::\n")
```
